channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Are seed oils actually bad for your health? Here's the science behind the controversy
item.description: Health Secretary RFK Jr. has said vegetable oils, like canola and soybean, are 'poisoning Americans.' But many researchers say the evidence isn't ther...

item.title: In the midst of grief, a woman is comforted by a stranger on the subway
item.description: A few days after her sister died, Maureen was on the subway when a stranger asked how she was doing. The conversation that followed is one that she wi...

item.title: Inside the evolution of Biosphere 2, from '90s punchline to scientific playground
item.description: The venture, privately funded to start, is now run by the University of Arizona. And today, scientists there are quietly plugging away at research the...

item.title: 'The worst day of my life:' Texas' Hill Country reels as deaths rise due to floods
item.description: Dozens of people have died in the Texas Hill Country. Scores of others are missing or unaccounted for. As rescue crews continue to search for victims,...

item.title: Mass shooting in Grays Ferry leaves 3 dead and 9 injured
item.description: A total of 13 people have been shot in Philadelphia's Grays Ferry neighborhood, leaving three people dead, police said.

item.title: Central Nairobi sealed off ahead of Kenyan protests
item.description: These are the latest in a wave of anti-government protests over the past year.

item.title: Death toll from Texas flash floods rises to at least 82, officials say
item.description: Almost a dozen people from a children's summer camp in Kerr County remain missing, officials said.

item.title: In a nation growing hostile toward homelessness, L.A. tries harm reduction

item.title: Risk of further floods in Texas during desperate search for missing as death toll tops 80
item.description: The risk of life-threatening flooding is still high in central Texas with more rain on the way. The urgent search for the missing continues following ...

item.title: At least 81 dead and dozens missing in Texas floods as more rain looms
item.description: The death toll looks certain to rise as search-and-rescue teams brace for further storms.

item.title: Methane gas kills 12 Turkish soldiers in Iraq operation
item.description: They were searching a cave to recover the body of a comrade who had been shot in 2022.

item.title: Watch: CCTV and phone recording shown to court in mushroom trial
item.description: Evidence shown in the trial of Erin Patterson has been shared by authorities after she was found guilty of murder.

item.title: Tropical depression Chantal flooding spurs North Carolina water rescues
item.description: Tropical depression Chantal brought flooding to North Carolina and spurred water rescues before moving over Virginia overnight Monday.

item.title: Owners of escaped pet lion arrested after it attacks three people
item.description: Dramatic footage showed the big cat leaping over a concrete wall then pouncing on a woman in Pakistan.
